title: The Unexpected Adventures of Walter Foster

story.text: Walter Foster begins his week like any other, tutoring students in physics. Little does he know that he is about to embark on an extraordinary journey.
While tutoring, Walter discovers he can manipulate time when explaining relativity, accidentally causing the clock to run backwards for a few seconds.
Walter decides to explore his newfound powers. He ventures downtown and covertly uses his time manipulation to prevent a small accident.
Word somehow gets out about a mysterious 'time corrector' in the city. Walter becomes both excited and nervous about his unintended fame.

The local news attempts to unveil the identity of the 'time corrector'. Meanwhile, Walter carefully assists a lost child in finding their way home by rewinding moments to interpret the childâ€™s previous path.
Curious scientists and enthusiasts start trying to track the phenomena. Walter, understanding the risks, cautiously uses his powers to erase traces of his interventions.

Reflecting on his week, Walter feels fulfilled sharing his 'superpower' discreetly. Deciding to keep his secret, he resumes his quiet life of tutoring, but always ready to assist secretly where needed.

ending: And so, Walter Foster continued weaving the fabric of time, subtly crafting a safer world.
moral: True heroes often remain unsung, their greatest deeds unnoticed.
